amendment.description: To limit the compensation paid to employees of the Middle East Broadcasting Networks.

vote.text: Amendment SA 269 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 269 proposed by Senator Lugar. (consideration: CR S3175; text: CR S3175) To limit the compensation paid to employees of the Middle East Broadcasting Networks.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 269 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 269 proposed by Senator Lugar.
